name.markdownDescription:
**Specify a name for the index**. 

 In each [namespace](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/limits/#faq-dev-namespace), names of all indexes in the namespace must be unique. If omitted, defaults to `default`.
name.description: Specify a name for the index.

database.description: Human readable label that identifies the database to contain the index.

collectionName.description: Human readable label that identifies the collection being indexed.

analyzer.markdownDescription:
**Specify the [analyzer](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/analyzers/#std-label-analyzers-ref) to apply to string fields when indexing**. 

 If you set this only at the top and do not specify an analyzer for the fields in the index definition, Atlas Search applies this analyzer to all the fields. To use a different analyzer for each field, you must specify a different analyzer for the field. If omitted, defaults to [Standard Analyzer](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/analyzers/standard/#std-label-ref-standard-analyzer).
analyzer.description: Analyzers are policies that combine a tokenizer, which extracts tokens from text, with filters that you define. Specify an analyzer

searchAnalyzer.markdownDescription:
**Specify the [analyzer](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/analyzers/#std-label-analyzers-ref) to apply to query text before searching with it**. 

 If omitted, defaults to the analyzer that you specify for the analyzer option. If you omit both the searchAnalyzer and the analyzer options, defaults to the [Standard Analyzer](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/analyzers/standard/#std-label-ref-standard-analyzer).
searchAnalyzer.description: Specify the analyzer to apply to query text before searching with it.

analyzers.markdownDescription: **Specify the [Custom Analyzers](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/analyzers/custom/#std-label-custom-analyzers) to use in this index.**
analyzers.description: Define a custom analyzer to suit your specific indexing needs.

storedSource.markdownDescription:
**Specify fields in the documents to store on Atlas Search**. 

 Value can be one of: 
- `true` to store all fields 
- `false`, to not store any fields and 
- [Object](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/stored-source-definition/#std-label-fts-stored-source-document) that specifies the fields to include or exclude from storage. 
 If omitted, defaults to `false`. To learn more about the syntax and fields, see [Define Stored Source Fields in Your Atlas Search Index](https://www.mongodb.com/docs/atlas/atlas-search/stored-source-definition/#std-label-fts-stored-source-definition)
storedSource.description: Specify fields in your documents by storing them on Atlas Search to improve query performance.
